/* 지역 카테고리 */
SELECT (CASE WHEN FIELD(SUBSTR(bm.branch_addr,1,2), '서울', '부산', '대구', '인천', '광주', '대전', '울산') < 1 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTR(bm.branch_addr,1,2),'도') ELSE SUBSTR(bm.branch_addr,1,2) END) AS branchAddr FROM branch_management AS bm GROUP BY SUBSTR(bm.branch_addr,1,2) ORDER BY FIELD(branch_addr, '서울', '부산', '대구', '인천', '광주', '대전', '울산', '강원도', '충청도', '전라도', '경상도', '제주도')
/* 가맹점 목록 */ SELECT branch_code AS branchCode, member_id AS memberId, branch_name AS branchName FROM branch_management;

/* 특정 코드로 객실 조회*/ SELECT ri.room_code, bm.branch_name, ri.room_name, ri.room_size, ri.room_basic_personnel, ri.room_max_personnel, ri.available_dog_types, ri.room_basic_price FROM room_information AS ri INNER JOIN branch_management AS bm ON ri.branch_code = bm.branch_code WHERE ri.room_code = #{roomCode};
